titleInfo.title: USA v. Mabey et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER entered GRANTING motions to continue the trial (Docs. 33 & 34). The trial is CONTINUED to the October 2012 criminal trial term with jury selection to commence on October 1, 2012. The Clerk of the Court is directed to refer this action to the appropriate Magistrate Judge for scheduling a new pretrial conference. Signed by Magistrate Judge William E. Cassady on 8/7/2012. (mca) ORDER entered GRANTING motions to continue the trial (Docs. 33 & 34). The trial is CONTINUED to the October 2012 criminal trial term with jury selection to commence on October 1, 2012. The Clerk of the Court is directed to refer this action to the appropriate Magistrate Judge for scheduling a new pretrial conference. Signed by Magistrate Judge William E. Cassady on 8/7/2012. (mca)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Mabey et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Bruce Mabey. Defendant was sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 6 months and one day, as to Count 2. SRT 3 years, as to Count 2. The defendant shall make restitution in the amount of $1,465,000; to be paid jointly and severally with co-defendant Patrick Michael Daleiden, CR 12-00132-002. DRUG TESTING REQUIREMENT IS WAIVED, AS TO THIS DEFENDANT. SA $100.00. The defendant was remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 1/3/2013. (mca)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:12-cr-00132; USA v. Mabey et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Southern District of Alabama
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to Bruce Mabey. Defendant was sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 6 months and one day, as to Count 2. SRT 3 years, as to Count 2. The defendant shall make restitution in the amount of $1,465,000; to be paid jointly and severally with co-defendant Patrick Michael Daleiden, CR 12-00132-002. DRUG TESTING REQUIREMENT IS WAIVED, AS TO THIS DEFENDANT. SA $100.00. The defendant was remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 1/3/2013. (mca)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Mabey et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Patrick Daleiden. Defendant was sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 27 months, as to each of Counts 1 and 2; said terms to run concurrently w/ special conditions. SRT 3 years, as to each of Counts 1 and 2; said terms to run concurrently w/ special conditions. Defendant shall make restitution in the amount of $1,465,000; to be paid jointly and severally with co-defendant Bruce Mabey, CR 12-00132-001. SA $100 was imposed, as to each of Counts 1 and 2, for a total SMA of $200. The defendant was remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 1/3/2013. (mca)
